title: folio
description: A minimalist digital whiteboard for sketching, annotating and prototyping. Built using React and SVG.

title: icons
description: An open source and hand-crafted SVG icon library, designed to be simple and easy to integrate.

title: lowcss
description: A low-level functional CSS toolkit for building modern and responsive websites.

title: mikel
description: Micro templating library with zero dependencies based on mustache.js with support for helpers, partials, and functions.

title: codecake
description: A tiny and lightweight code editor for web applications, that can be easily integrated into any web application for efficient and hassle-free code editing.
